name: Vector Highway
description:
For others there is the destination.    For you there is only...

Vector Highway.

Set on a straight and decidedly abstract stretch of computer-generated road, Vector Highway is a traditional arcade score chaser where the aim is to survive as long as possible.

Featuring 16 looping sectors that contain a badly maintained car, exciting bonus rounds, unexpected surprises and a satnav having an existential crisis; Vector Highway aims to provide all of the fun of a traditional arcade game without the need for a bag of 50ps.
